case.title: Lunchtime Kissing Fest - 35 (Battery Park)
case.text: Down in the World Financial Center and looking for a cute guy that would appreciate a mid day make-out session. Work is so boring and I would love to walk around at lunch and sneak away to a little corner and enjoy some amazing kissing. Pretty and smart with great lips. Send a face pic if you like. Lunch is soon so pucker up!
